articles.author: Ryan Dinsdale
articles.title: Until Dawn PS5 and PC Remake Suffers a Rough Launch - IGN
articles.description: Sony's Until Dawn remake for PlayStation 5 and PC is having a rough launch, with not just technical issues but low player numbers.
articles.content:
Sony's Until Dawn remake for PlayStation 5 and PC is having a rough launch, with not just technical issues but low player numbers too.
The remake of the 2015 horror game which comes with updated gra… [+2793 chars]

articles.title: Planetary Defense Mission: Hera Launches for Asteroid Crash Scene Investigation - SciTechDaily
articles.description: ESA's Hera spacecraft has embarked on a groundbreaking mission to the binary asteroid system, Didymos, to enhance planetary defense techniques. This mission follows NASA's successful DART mission which altered the orbit of Didymos' moonlet, Dimorphos. Hera wi…
articles.content: ESA’s Hera mission lifted off on a SpaceX Falcon 9 from Cape Canaveral Space Force Station in Florida, USA, on October 7 at 10:52 local time (16:52 CEST, 14:52 UTC). Hera is ESA’s first planetary def… [+10520 chars]
